name: MindSafe
signal_source: Users report: 'I'm tired of apps that require more mental energy to maintain than they save' and 'need something that actually reduces the cognitive load'
description: AI-powered cognitive offloading system that learns user patterns and automatically captures, organizes, and surfaces relevant information when needed
target_user: Knowledge workers struggling with information overload and decision fatigue
pain_point_evidence: Research shows decision fatigue significantly impacts productivity; users cite 'mental exhaustion from constant micro-decisions' as major productivity barrier
core_loop: Passively capture user context and decisions
differentiation: Focuses on reducing cognitive burden rather than organizing tasks; AI learns user context to minimize decision-making overhead
subscription_fit: Ongoing AI learning and cloud sync create compelling recurring value for cognitive optimization

pricing.trial_strategy: 30-day free trial to demonstrate cognitive burden reduction
